attributes.action: Review into English football, looking at making all clubs 51% fan owned
attributes.additional_details: As the announcement of the European Super League has highlighted the vast gap football and the fans have now and the fans alone can’t do this
attributes.background: Step in and review English football and work with FA and UEFA to implement the same rule as Germany that makes English football clubs 51% owned by fans

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583310
